title: Biden tells LGBTQ children 'you are loved and accepted just as you are' after Florida advances 'Don't Say Gay' bill - CNN
content:
1. Biden tells LGBTQ children 'you are loved and accepted just as you are' after Florida advances 'Don't Say Gay' bill  CNN
  2. White House blasts Florida GOP's 'Don't Say Gay' school bill  Yahoo News
  3. Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signals support for 'Don't Say Gay' bill  NBC News
  4. 'Don't say gay' legislation is wrong for Florida | Letters to the editor  South Florida Sun Sentinel
  5. ‘Don’t Say Gay’ tries to erase LGBTQ people from schools | Commentary  Orlando Sentinel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday took the rare step of weighing in on a controversial Florida bill that would ban certain discussions about sexual orientation and gender identity in the classroom, telling LGBTQ kids that he has their back.
